北の政所: (きたのまんどころ) - legal wife of a regent, of the imperial adviser, or of an official at the Grand Council of State
北の方: (きたのかた) - northward/facing the north; nobleman's true wife
北アイルランド: (きたアイルランド) - Northern Ireland

北下ろし: (きたおろし) - cold wind from the northern uplands
北京条約: (ペキンじょうやく) - Convention of Peking
北側: (ほくそく) - north side; north bank
北前船: (きたまえぶね) - cargo ships that sailed the Japan Sea during the Edo period
北十字星: (きたじゅうじせい) - Northern Cross (asterism)
北叟笑む: (ほくそえむ) - to chuckle; to gloat; to snicker
北向き: (きたむき) - facing north; northern exposure
北回帰線: (きたかいきせん) - Tropic of Cancer
北国: (ほっこく) - northern provinces; northern countries
北国赤海老: (ホッコクアカエビ) - northern shrimp (Pandalus borealis); sweet shrimp; northern pink prawn; red shrimp; Maine shrimp
北堂: (ほくどう) - northern pavilion of a house; mother
北大平洋: (きたたいへいよう) - the North Pacific

北太平洋: (きたたいへいよう) - the North Pacific
北宋: (ほくそう) - Northern Song (dynasty of China)
北寄り: (きたより) - northerly (wind); from the north
北寄貝: (ほっきがい) - Sakhalin surf clam (Pseudocardium sachalinense)
北岸: (ほくがん) - north coast; north bank
北岸沿いに: (ほくがんぞいに) - along the north coast; along the northern sea shore
北嶺: (ほくれい) - northern mountain; Mt. Hiei
北川姫鱒: (キタカワヒメマス) - Arctic grayling (Thymallus arcticus)

北支事変: (ほくしじへん) - the Marco Polo Bridge Incident
北斉: (ほくせい) - Northern Qi (dynasty of China; 550-577 CE)
北斗: (ほくと) - {astron}  the Big Dipper (asterism); the Plough; the Plow
北方人種: (ほっぽうじんしゅ) - Nordic race
北方仏教: (ほっぽうぶっきょう) - Northern Buddhism (as practiced in East Asia)
北方四島: (ほっぽうよんとう) - the four northern islands (held by Russia); south Kuril Islands; northern territories

北方真獣類: (ほっぽうしんじゅうるい) - Boreoeutheria (clade of placental mammals); Boreotheria; boreoeutherians
北方限界線: (ほっぽうげんかいせん) - Northern Limit Line; North Limit Line; NLL; demarcation line in the Yellow Sea between North Korea and South Korea
北方領土: (ほっぽうりょうど) - the Northern Territories
北方領土問題: (ほっぽうりょうどもんだい) - Northern Territories problem; Northern Territories issue
北日本: (きたにっぽん) - northern Japan (usu. referring to Tohoku and Hokkaido)
北朝鮮人: (きたちょうせんじん) - North Korean person
北東航路: (ほくとうこうろ) - Northeast Passage (sea route along the north coast of Russia)
北枕: (キタマクラ) - lying with one's head to the north (trad. position for dead bodies; taboo for sleeping); brown-lined puffer (species of pufferfish, Canthigaster rivulata)

北極光: (ほっきょくこう) - northern lights; aurora borealis
北極圏: (ほっきょくけん) - Arctic Circle; the Arctic
北極地方: (ほっきょくちほう) - Arctic region; north polar region
北極岩魚: (ホッキョクイワナ) - arctic char (Salvelinus alpinus)
北極振動: (ほっきょくしんどう) - Arctic oscillation

北極鱈: (ホッキョクダラ) - Arctic cod (Boreogadus saida); polar cod
